resources.string:
To test yourself for COVID-19 with your phone, follow these steps. 


 The symptoms test allows you to respond to a few questions and quickly get a diagnosis with a 95% accuracy. It predicts if you are sick in general, not specifically COVID-19. 

 The cough test will require you to record yourself coughing, and you will receive a diagnosis with up to an 80% accuracy. For the test to be accurate you must know you are sick beforehand. If you are unsure if you are sick, try the symptoms test first.
